CREATE TABLE TDBHttpParam ( httpID VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Http请求的ID' ,paramName VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL COMMENT '参数名称' ,paramValue VARCHAR(4000) COMMENT '参数数值' ,comment VARCHAR(4000) COMMENT '注释说明' ,createUserID VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '数据创建人ID' ,createTime DATETIME NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;/
ALTER TABLE TDBHttpParam ADD CONSTRAINT PK_DBHttpParam PRIMARY KEY (httpID ,paramName);/ ALTER TABLE TDBHttpParam ADD CONSTRAINT FK_DBHttpParam_HttpID FOREIGN KEY (httpID) REFERENCES TDBHttp (id);/
ALTER TABLE TDBHttpParam COMMENT = '数据Http请求参数';/
